DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences with jurisdictional netting.

DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNet.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net
DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNet.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, without jurisdictional netting.

DeferredTaxLiabilities.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Net
DeferredTaxLiabilities.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences without jurisdictional netting.

DueFromOfficersOrStockholders.label: Due from Officers or Stockholders
DueFromOfficersOrStockholders.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amounts due from owners or owners with a beneficial interest of more than 10 percent of the voting interests or officers of the company.

DueFromRelatedPartiesCurrent.label: Due from Related Parties, Current
DueFromRelatedPartiesCurrent.description: The aggregate amount of receivables to be collected from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth, at the financial statement date. which are usually due within one year (or one business cycle).

EquityMethodInvestmentOtherThanTemporary.label: Equity Method Investment, Other than Temporary Impairment
EquityMethodInvestmentOtherThanTemporary.description: This item represents an other than temporary decline in value that has been recognized against an investment accounted for under the equity method of accounting. The excess of the carrying amount over the fair value of the investment represents the amount of the write down which is or was reflected in earnings. The written down value is a new cost basis with the adjusted value of the investment becoming its new carrying value subject to the equity accounting method. Evidence of a loss in value might include, but would not necessarily be limited to, absence of an ability to recover the carrying amount of the investment or inability of the investee to sustain an earnings capacity which would justify the carrying amount of the investment.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Remainder of Fiscal Year
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in remainder of current fiscal year.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Amortization Expense, Rolling after Year Five
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized after the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Amortization Expense, Rolling Year Five
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization expense for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life expected to be recognized in the fifth rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsTranslationAn.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Translation and Purchase Accounting Adjustments
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsTranslationAn.description: Amount of increase (decrease) to assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life for foreign currency translation adjustments and purchase accounting adjustments.

GoodwillNotAllocatedAmount.label: Goodwill, Not Allocated, Amount
GoodwillNotAllocatedAmount.description: Portion of goodwill not yet allocated to reportable segments.

GoodwillTransfers.label: Goodwill, Transfers
GoodwillTransfers.description: Amount of transfers into (out of) an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitContinuingOperati.label: Income Tax (Expense) Benefit, Continuing Operations, Government Grants
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefitContinuingOperati.description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit from continuing operations attributable to government grants to the extent recognized as a reduction of income tax expense.

IntangibleAssetsNetExcludingGoodwill.label: Intangible Assets, Net (Excluding Goodwill)
IntangibleAssetsNetExcludingGoodwill.description: Sum of the carrying amounts of all intangible assets, excluding goodwill, as of the balance sheet date, net of accumulated amortization and impairment charges.

InvestmentsAndCash.label: Investments and Cash
InvestmentsAndCash.description: Sum of investments and unrestricted cash as of the balance sheet date.

LesseeOperatingLeaseDiscountRate.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Discount Rate
LesseeOperatingLeaseDiscountRate.description: Discount rate used by lessee to determine present value of operating lease payments.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Net Amount
LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.description: Amount after allowance and deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans held for sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Gain (Loss) Arising During Period, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.description: Amount after tax, before reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

OtherShortTermInvestments.label: Other Short-term Investments
OtherShortTermInvestments.description: Amount of short-term investments classified as other.

PaymentsToAcquireLoansReceivable.label: Payments to Acquire Loans Receivable
PaymentsToAcquireLoansReceivable.description: The cash outflow for the purchase of loan receivable arising from the financing of goods and services.

PaymentsToSuppliers.label: Payments to Suppliers
PaymentsToSuppliers.description: Payments of cash to suppliers for goods and services during the current period.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProductLiabilityAccrualComponentAmount.label: Product Liability Accrual, Component Amount
ProductLiabilityAccrualComponentAmount.description: Recorded amount of the accrual for a material component of a product liability contingency.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOwnedAccumulate.label: Property, Plant, and Equipment, Owned, Accumulated Depreciation
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOwnedAccumulate.description: The cumulative amount of depreciation (related to long-lived, depreciable flight assets owned by the entity and used in the entity's principle business operations and capitalized assets classified as property, plant and equipment that are owned by the entity) that has been recognized in the income statement.

RegulatedOperatingRevenueOther.label: Regulated Operating Revenue, Other
RegulatedOperatingRevenueOther.description: The amount of regulated other operating revenues recognized during the period.

RestrictedStockValueSharesIssuedNetOfTax.label: Restricted Stock, Value, Shares Issued Net of Tax Withholdings
RestrictedStockValueSharesIssuedNetOfTax.description: Value, after value of shares used to satisfy grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement, of restricted shares issued. Excludes cash used to satisfy grantee's tax withholding obligation.

SaleOfStockNumberOfSharesIssuedInTransac.label: Sale of Stock, Number of Shares Issued in Transaction
SaleOfStockNumberOfSharesIssuedInTransac.description: The number of shares issued or sold by the subsidiary or equity method investee per stock transaction.

SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.label: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Fair Value of Collateral
SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.description: Fair value of securities pledged as collateral against securities sold under agreement to repurchase.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted-average price as of the balance sheet date at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance on vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable under the stock option plan.

ShortTermBankLoansAndNotesPayable.label: Short-term Bank Loans and Notes Payable
ShortTermBankLoansAndNotesPayable.description: Amount of borrowings from a bank classified as other, maturing within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesTreasurySto.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Treasury Stock Reissued
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesTreasurySto.description: Number of treasury shares or units reissued. Excludes reissuance of shares or units in treasury for award under share-based payment arrangement.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Acquisitions
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.description: Value of stock issued pursuant to acquisitions during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Convertible Securities
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.description: The gross value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of convertible securities.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Units
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.description: Value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of units. An example of a convertible unit is an umbrella partnership real estate investment trust unit (UPREIT unit).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeBene.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Employee Benefit Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeBene.description: Value of shares issued during the period to an employee benefit plan, such as a defined contribution or defined benefit plan.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Other
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.description: Value of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

AcceleratedShareRepurchasesInitialPriceP.label: Accelerated Share Repurchases, Initial Price Paid Per Share
AcceleratedShareRepurchasesInitialPriceP.description: The price paid per share to immediately purchase the targeted number of shares on the date of executing the accelerated share repurchase agreement.

AccountsReceivableGross.label: Accounts Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss
AccountsReceivableGross.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business.

AccruedMarketingCostsCurrent.label: Accrued Marketing Costs, Current
AccruedMarketingCostsCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for the marketing, trade and selling of the entity's goods and services. Marketing costs would include expenditures for planning and executing the conception, pricing, promotion, and distribution of ideas, goods, and services; costs of public relations and corporate promotions; and obligations incurred and payable for sales discounts, rebates, price protection programs, etc. offered to customers and under government programs. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AccruedProfessionalFeesCurrent.label: Accrued Professional Fees, Current
AccruedProfessionalFeesCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for professional fees, such as for legal and accounting services received. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalConv.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Convertible Debt with Conversion Feature
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalConv.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from recognition of deferred taxes for convertible debt with a beneficial conversion feature.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalWarr.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Warrant Issued
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalWarr.description: Amount of increase in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from the issuance of warrants. Includes allocation of proceeds of debt securities issued with detachable stock purchase warrants.

AdvancesOnInventoryPurchases.label: Advances on Inventory Purchases
AdvancesOnInventoryPurchases.description: Carrying value of capitalized payments made in advance for inventory that is expected to be received within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivable.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivable.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableNo.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableNo.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, classified as noncurrent.

AuctionMarketPreferredSecuritiesStockSer.label: Auction Market Preferred Securities, Stock Series, Par Value Per Share
AuctionMarketPreferredSecuritiesStockSer.description: The par value of the auction market preferred security.

CapitalUnitsNetAmount.label: Capital Units, Net Amount
CapitalUnitsNetAmount.description: Net amount applicable to investors of capital units or shares.

ContractWithCustomerAssetGross.label: Contract with Customer, Asset, before Allowance for Credit Loss
ContractWithCustomerAssetGross.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer, when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

DeferredOfferingCosts.label: Deferred Offering Costs
DeferredOfferingCosts.description: Specific incremental costs directly attributable to a proposed or actual offering of securities which are deferred at the end of the reporting period.

DeferredTaxAssetsGross.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Gross
DeferredTaxAssetsGross.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsOther.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Other
DeferredTaxAssetsOther.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences, classified as other.

DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowance.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Valuation Allowance
DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowance.description: Amount of deferred tax assets for which it is more likely than not that a tax benefit will not be realized.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDeferredExpense.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Deferred Expense
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDeferredExpense.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from capitalized costs.

DefinedBenefitPlanNumberOfSharesOfEquity.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Employer, Related Party, Number of Shares
DefinedBenefitPlanNumberOfSharesOfEquity.description: Number of shares of employer stock in which defined benefit plan asset is invested. Includes, but is not limited to, stock issued or managed by related party of employer.

FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.label: Finance Lease, Principal Payments
FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.description: Amount of cash outflow for principal payment on finance lease.

ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets (Excluding Goodwill)
ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.description: The amount of impairment loss recognized in the period resulting from the write-down of the carrying amount of an intangible asset (excluding goodwill) to fair value.

IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Enacted Tax Rate, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to increase (decrease) in the income tax rates.

IncreaseDecreaseInContractWithCustomerLi.label: Increase (Decrease) in Contract with Customer, Liability
IncreaseDecreaseInContractWithCustomerLi.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidSupplies.label: Increase (Decrease) in Prepaid Supplies
IncreaseDecreaseInPrepaidSupplies.description: Amount of increase (decrease) of consideration paid in advance for supplies that provide economic benefits in future periods.

InvestmentIncomeInvestmentExpense.label: Investment Income, Investment Expense
InvestmentIncomeInvestmentExpense.description: Amount of expenses related to the generation of investment income.

InvestmentOwnedBalancePrincipalAmount.label: Investment Owned, Balance, Principal Amount
InvestmentOwnedBalancePrincipalAmount.description: For investments which are quantified by principal amount, the principle balance held at close of period.

LineOfCreditFacilityAnnualPrincipalPayme.label: Line of Credit Facility, Annual Principal Payment
LineOfCreditFacilityAnnualPrincipalPayme.description: Amount of the total principal payments made during the annual reporting period.

OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.label: Other Asset Impairment Charges
OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.description: The charge against earnings resulting from the write down of long lived assets other than goodwill due to the difference between the carrying value and lower fair value.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

OtherLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Other Liabilities, Current
OtherLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherReceivables.label: Other Receivables
OtherReceivables.description: Amount due from parties in nontrade transactions, classified as other.

OtherReceivablesNetCurrent.label: Other Receivables, Net, Current
OtherReceivablesNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance, of receivables classified as other, due within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

PaymentsForOtherDeposits.label: Payments for Other Deposits
PaymentsForOtherDeposits.description: Amount of cash outflow for deposits classified as other.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt by a related party. Related parties, include, but are not limited to, affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, and pension trusts.

ReorganizationValueNetRealizableValueOfA.label: Reorganization Value, Net Realizable Value of Asset Dispositions
ReorganizationValueNetRealizableValueOfA.description: Amount of reorganization value related to estimated net realizable value of asset dispositions. Reorganization value is the amount attributed to the reconstituted entity, as well as the expected net realizable value of those assets that will be disposed before reconstitution occurs.

RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.label: Repayments of Short-term Debt
RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryi.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Current
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryi.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as current. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RevenuesNetOfInterestExpense.label: Revenues, Net of Interest Expense
RevenuesNetOfInterestExpense.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income after deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

SharePrice.label: Share Price
SharePrice.description: Price of a single share of a number of saleable stocks of a company.

StockholdersEquityNoteSubscriptionsRecei.label: Stockholders' Equity Note, Subscriptions Receivable
StockholdersEquityNoteSubscriptionsRecei.description: Note received instead of cash as contribution to equity. The transaction may be a sale of capital stock or a contribution to paid-in capital.

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Shares
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and have not been retired and are not held in treasury. Some state laws may govern the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

TransferToInvestments.label: Transfer to Investments
TransferToInvestments.description: Value of investments transferred to the entity's investments in noncash transactions.

ValueAddedTaxReceivable.label: Value Added Tax Receivable
ValueAddedTaxReceivable.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of value added taxes due either from customers arising from sales on credit terms, or as previously overpaid to tax authorities.

WarehouseAgreementBorrowings.label: Warehouse Agreement Borrowings
WarehouseAgreementBorrowings.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the outstanding short-term borrowings under a revolving line of credit used by mortgage bankers to finance the origination or purchase of loans.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

AccountsReceivableNet.label: Accounts Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
AccountsReceivableNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business.

AccountsReceivableSale.label: Accounts Receivable, Sale
AccountsReceivableSale.description: Amount of decrease from sale of accounts receivable.

CommonUnitIssued.label: Common Unit, Issued
CommonUnitIssued.description: Number of common units issued of limited liability company (LLC).

CostOfGoodsAndServicesSoldDepreciation.label: Cost, Depreciation
CostOfGoodsAndServicesSoldDepreciation.description: Amount of expense for allocation of cost of tangible asset over its useful life directly used in production of good and rendering of service.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.description: Percentage of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

FinanceLeaseInterestPaymentOnLiability.label: Finance Lease, Interest Payment on Liability
FinanceLeaseInterestPaymentOnLiability.description: Amount of interest paid on finance lease liability.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRemainderOf.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRemainderOf.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityUndiscountedExcessA.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
FinanceLeaseLiabilityUndiscountedExcessA.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsExcluding.label: Indefinite-lived Intangible Assets (Excluding Goodwill)
IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsExcluding.description: Amount of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit.

InvestmentSoldNotYetPurchasedBalancePrin.label: Investment Sold, Not yet Purchased, Balance, Principal Amount
InvestmentSoldNotYetPurchasedBalancePrin.description: For investments which are quantified by principal amount, the principle balance held at close of period.

LiabilitiesNoncurrent.label: Liabilities, Noncurrent
LiabilitiesNoncurrent.description: Amount of obligation due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRema.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Remainder of Fiscal Year
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRema.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementInitialDir.label: Operating Leases, Income Statement, Initial Direct Costs
OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementInitialDir.description: Costs that are essential to acquiring the lease and would not otherwise have been incurred without the lease agreement, including evaluating the lessee's credit condition, guarantees, and collateral and costs incurred negotiating, processing, and closing the lease agreement.

OtherNonoperatingIncome.label: Other Nonoperating Income
OtherNonoperatingIncome.description: Amount of income related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentDisposals.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Disposals
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentDisposals.description: Amount of divestiture of long-lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment.

RelatedPartyTaxExpenseDueToAffiliatesCur.label: Related Party Tax Expense, Due to Affiliates, Current
RelatedPartyTaxExpenseDueToAffiliatesCur.description: The amount of any current tax-related balances due to affiliates as of the date of each statement of financial position presented.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableCu.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableCu.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, classified as current.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivablePe.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Period Increase (Decrease)
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivablePe.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable.

AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.label: Amortization of Debt Issuance Costs
AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to debt issuance costs.

BuildingsAndImprovementsGross.label: Buildings and Improvements, Gross
BuildingsAndImprovementsGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of building structures held for productive use including addition, improvement, or renovation to the structure, including, but not limited to, interior masonry, interior flooring, electrical, and plumbing.

BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransfer.label: Business Combination, Consideration Transferred
BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransfer.description: Amount of consideration transferred, consisting of acquisition-date fair value of assets transferred by the acquirer, liabilities incurred by the acquirer, and equity interest issued by the acquirer.

ClassOfWarrantOrRightExercisePriceOfWarr.label: Class of Warrant or Right, Exercise Price of Warrants or Rights
ClassOfWarrantOrRightExercisePriceOfWarr.description: Exercise price per share or per unit of warrants or rights outstanding.

ConversionOfStockSharesConverted1.label: Conversion of Stock, Shares Converted
ConversionOfStockSharesConverted1.description: "The number of shares converted in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

CostOfGoodsAndServicesSoldAmortization.label: Cost, Amortization
CostOfGoodsAndServicesSoldAmortization.description: Amount of expense for allocation of cost of intangible asset over its useful life directly used in production of good and rendering of service.

CostOfGoodsAndServicesSoldDepreciationAn.label: Cost, Depreciation and Amortization
CostOfGoodsAndServicesSoldDepreciationAn.description: Amount of expense for allocation of cost of tangible and intangible assets over their useful lives directly used in production of good and rendering of service.

FinanceLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRateP.label: Finance Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
FinanceLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRateP.description: Weighted average discount rate for finance lease calculated at point in time.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year One
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

GainLossOnDispositionOfIntangibleAssets.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Intangible Assets
GainLossOnDispositionOfIntangibleAssets.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of intangible assets.

ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsFinitelived.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets, Finite-lived
ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsFinitelived.description: The amount of impairment loss recognized in the period resulting from the write-down of the carrying amount of a finite-lived intangible asset to fair value.

IncomeLossAttributableToParent.label: Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent, before Tax
IncomeLossAttributableToParent.description: Amount, before tax, of income (loss) attributable to parent. Includes, but is not limited to, income (loss) from continuing operations, discontinued operations and equity method investments.

InventoryBuildingsAndImprovements.label: Inventory, Buildings and Improvements
InventoryBuildingsAndImprovements.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of building structures held as inventory including any additions, improvements, or renovations to those structures.

LossContingencyDamagesPaidValue.label: Loss Contingency, Damages Paid, Value
LossContingencyDamagesPaidValue.description: Amount of damages paid to the plaintiff in the legal matter.

LossContingencyEstimateOfPossibleLoss.label: Loss Contingency, Estimate of Possible Loss
LossContingencyEstimateOfPossibleLoss.description: Reflects the estimated amount of loss from the specified contingency as of the balance sheet date.

MachineryAndEquipmentGross.label: Machinery and Equipment, Gross
MachineryAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of tangible personal property used to produce goods and services, including, but is not limited to, tools, dies and molds, computer and office equipment.

NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromSubsid.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Increase from Subsidiary Equity Issuance
NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromSubsid.description: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from subsidiary issuance of equity interests to noncontrolling interest holders.

OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.label: Other Operating Income (Expense), Net
OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of other operating income and expenses, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operations.

PaymentsForDeposits.label: Payments for Deposits
PaymentsForDeposits.description: The amount of cash paid for deposits on goods and services during the period; excludes time deposits and deposits with other institutions, which pertain to financial service entities.

PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssetsNoncurrent.label: Prepaid Expense and Other Assets, Noncurrent
PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssetsNoncurrent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets that are expected to be realized or consumed after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash inflow from a long-term borrowing made from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances from Affiliates.

ProceedsFromSaleOfIntangibleAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Intangible Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfIntangibleAssets.description: The cash inflow from disposal of asset without physical form usually arising from contractual or other legal rights, excluding goodwill.

ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.label: Accounts Receivable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on accounts receivable.

ProvisionForOtherCreditLosses.label: Provision for Other Credit Losses
ProvisionForOtherCreditLosses.description: Amount of expense related to credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions.

RestrictedCashCurrent.label: Restricted Cash, Current
RestrictedCashCurrent.description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as current. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedOnTransa.label: Sale of Stock, Consideration Received on Transaction
SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedOnTransa.description: Cash received on stock transaction after deduction of issuance costs.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShortTermBorrowings.label: Short-term Debt
ShortTermBorrowings.description: Reflects the total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of debt having initial terms less than one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ShortTermLeasePayments.label: Short-term Lease Payments
ShortTermLeasePayments.description: Amount of cash outflow for short-term lease payment excluded from lease liability.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.description: Number of new stock issued during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesOther.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Other
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesOther.description: Number of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

ValueAddedTaxReceivableCurrent.label: Value Added Tax Receivable, Current
ValueAddedTaxReceivableCurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of value added taxes due either from customers arising from sales on credit terms, or as previously overpaid to tax authorities. For classified balance sheets, represents the current amount receivable, that is amounts expected to be collected within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

WarrantExercisePriceIncrease.label: Warrant, Exercise Price, Increase
WarrantExercisePriceIncrease.description: Per share increase in exercise price of warrant. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

GainLossOnInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Investments
GainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

NotesAndLoansReceivableNetCurrent.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
NotesAndLoansReceivableNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable, classified as current. Includes, but is not limited to, notes and loan receivable.

RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncluding.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Including Assessed Tax
RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncluding.description: Amount, including tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value-added and excise.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Capital and Surplus, Balance
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.description: The amount of statutory capital and surplus (stockholders' equity) as of the balance sheet date using prescribed or permitted statutory accounting practices (rather than GAAP, if different) of the state or country.

Supplies.label: Prepaid Supplies
Supplies.description: Amount of consideration paid in advance for supplies that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.
